service.title: Useless GET Service
service.documentation: This service does nothing other than accepting GET requests and complaining.

http-method.documentation: Accept GET requests but don't really do anything.

http-status.documentation: Whatever you GET, always say that you did not find the resource, and blame it on the user.
Occasionally, instead of not finding something, it is being reported as blocked for legal reasons.
